article_title: News Corp to Sell 11 Community Newspapers
article_text:
News Corp agreed to sell its community newspaper business to Les and Jennifer Goodstein, owners of several local New York papers.

The business, Community Newspaper Group, is based in Brooklyn and is a network of 11 community newspapers and websites, including the Brooklyn Paper and the Bronx Times Reporter.
